NOTES: ""Uses Allowed As A Permitted Or Conditional Use In The Underlying Zoning District Require The Approval Of The Development Review Board As A Conditional Use In Accordance With Section 260 And The Supplemental District Standards Set Forth Below"" (Page 45).

Adus Are Noted As Prohibited Because "Accessory Apartments" (Which Refer to Adus In The Zoning Code) Are not Listed As Permitted Or Conditional Use. Springfield Aquifer Re-Charge Protection Area—Secondary District
Springfield Downtown Design Control Overlay District

NOTES: The Number Of Dwelling Units Allowed In The Planned Residential Development Shall not Exceed 125 Percent Of The Number Which, In The Development Review Board's Judgment, Could Be Developed On The Parcel In Conformance With The Land Use Development Regulations For The District In Which The Development Is Located.

The Number Of Dwelling Units Allowed In The Planned Residential Development Shall not Exceed 125 Percent Of The Number Which, In The Development Review Board's Judgment, Could Be Developed On The Parcel In Conformance With The Land Use Development Regulations For The District In Which The Development Is Located.
Altering A Single-Family Home to A Two-Family One Is A Permitted Use That Does not Require Conditional Use Approval. However, New Constructions Of Two-Family Homes Are not Permitted.

Altering A Single-Family Home to A Two-Family One Is A Permitted Use That Does not Require Conditional Use Approval. It Is not Explicitly Said If Two-Family Homes Are Permitted With Conditional Use, But It Is Possible to Apply For "Other Uses" Under Conditional Use So Long As They Are Characterizable As Similar to Uses Otherwise Conditionally Permitted/Permitted. Given That Two-Family Alterations Are Permitted, It Reasons That A New Two-Family Construction Would Be Characterizable As Such.

Altering A Single-Family Home to A Two-Family One Is A Permitted Use That Does not Require Conditional Use Approval. It Is not Explicitly Said If Two-Family Homes Are Permitted With Conditional Use, But It Is Possible to Apply For "Other Uses" Under Conditional Use So Long As They Are Characterizable As Similar to Uses Otherwise Conditionally Permitted/Permitted. Given That Two-Family Alterations Are Permitted, It Reasons That A New Two-Family Construction Would Be Characterizable As Such.

Altering A Single-Family Home to A Two-Family One Is A Permitted Use That Does not Require Conditional Use Approval. It Is not Explicitly Said If Two-Family Homes Are Permitted With Conditional Use, But It Is Possible to Apply For "Other Uses" Under Conditional Use So Long As They Are Characterizable As Similar to Uses Otherwise Conditionally Permitted/Permitted. Given That Two-Family Alterations Are Permitted, It Reasons That A New Two-Family Construction Would Be Characterizable As Such.
Altering A Single-Family Home to A Two-Family One Is A Permitted Use That Does not Require Conditional Use Approval.
The Only Permissible Dwellings Are Single And Two Family Dwellings That Are Part Of An Approved Pud.
Andover Is Zoned Entirely As One District And Therefore Does not Have A Zoning Map.
AFF_DEF:
“Affordable Housing” Means Either of The Following:

(1) Housing That is Owned By Its Inhabitants Whose Gross Annual Household Income Does Not
Exceed 80 Percent of The County Median Income, Or 80 Percent of The Standard Metropolitan
Statistical Area Income if The Municipality is Located In Such An Area, As Defined By The
United States Department of Housing And Urban Development, And The Total Annual Cost Of
The Housing, Including Principal, Interest, Taxes, Insurance, And Condominium Association
Fees is not More Than 30 Percent of The Household’s Gross Annual Income.

(2) Housing That is Rented By Its Inhabitants Whose Gross Annual Household Income Does Not
Exceed 80 Percent of The County Median Income, Or 80 Percent of The Standard Metropolitan
Statistical Area Income if The Municipality is Located In Such An Area, As Defined By The
United States Department of Housing And Urban Development, And The Total Annual Cost Of
The Housing, Including Rent, Utilities, And Condominium Association Fees, is not More Than
30 Percent of The Household’s Gross Annual Income.

Additionally, "Affordable Housing Development" is Defined As: "A Housing Development of Which At Least 20
Percent of The Units Or a Minimum of Five Units, Whichever is Greater, Are Affordable Housing
Units. Affordable Units Shall Be Subject to Covenants Or Restrictions That Preserve Their
Affordability For a Minimum of 30 Years Or Longer As Provided In Municipal Bylaws"

NOTES: Baltimore Has Just One Zoning District And Therefore No Zoning Map.
AFF_DEF:
Affordable Housing Means Either of The Following:

A. Housing That is Owned By Its Inhabitants Whose Gross Annual Household Income Does Not
Exceed 80 Percent of The County Median Income, Or 80 Percent of The Standard
Metropolitan Statistical Area Income if The Municipality is Located In Such An Area, As
Defined By The United States Department of Housing And Urban Development, And The
Total Annual Cost of The Housing, Including Principal, Interest, Taxes, Insurance, And
Condominium Association Fees is not More Than 30 Percent of The Household’s Gross
Annual Income.

B. Housing That is Rented By Its Inhabitants Whose Gross Annual Household Income Does Not
Exceed 80 Percent of The County Median Income, Or 80 Percent of The Standard
Metropolitan Statistical Area Income if The Municipality is Located In Such An Area, As
Defined By The United States Department of Housing And Urban Development, And The
Total Annual Cost of The Housing, Including Rent, Utilities, And Condominium Association
Fees, is not More Than 30 Percent of The Household’s Gross Annual Income.

Affordable Housing Development Means: a Housing Development of Which At Least 20 Percent of The Units Or A
Minimum of Five Units, Whichever is Greater, Are Affordable Housing Units. Affordable Units Shall Be Subject To
Covenants Or Restrictions That Preserve Their Affordability For a Minimum of 15 Years Or Longer As Provided In
Municipal Bylaws.

NOTES: All Dimensional Standards Default to Those Of The Underlying District.

AFF_DEF:
Either:

(A) Housing That is Owned By Its Inhabitants Whose Gross Annual Household Income Does not Exceed 80 Percent of The County Median Income, Or 80 Percent of The Standard Metropolitan Statistical Area Income if The Municipality is Located In Such An Area, As Defined By The United States Department of Housing And Urban Development, And The Total Annual Cost of The Housing, Including Principal, Interest, Taxes, Insurance, And Condominium Association Fees is not More Than 30 Percent of The Household’s Gross Annual Income.

Or

(B) Housing That is Rented By Its Inhabitants Whose Gross Annual Household Income Does not Exceed 80 Percent of The County Median Income, Or 80 Percent of The Standard Metropolitan Statistical Area Income if The Municipality is Located In Such An Area, As Defined By The United States Department of Housing And Urban Development, And The Total Annual Cost of The Housing, Including Rent, Utilities, And Condominium Association Fees, is not More Than 30 Percent of The Household’s Gross Annual Income.

NOTES: This District Has 3 Classes: (1) Municipal Sewer And Municipal Or Public Water (2) Municipal Sewer And Individual Water (3) Individual Sewer And Individual, Municipal, Or Public Water
This District Consists Of Two Subdistricts, Res-25 And Res-10, Which Will Be Listed As Alternatives In That Order For The Following Dimensional Standards.

Uses Allowed As A Permitted Or Conditional Use In The Underlying Zoning District Require The Approval Of The Planning Commission In This Overlay Except Agriculture/Forestry And Small Accessory Structures Or Additions to Existing Structures.

JXTN_DIST_NAME: Reading Significant Wildlife Habitat Overlay District
NOTES: The Maximum Density For This Overlay Is 1 Lot Per 25 Acres With A Minimum Lot Size Of 5 Acres. All Proposals Are Reviewed By The Vermont Fish And Wildlife Department to Ensure Building Does not Impact The Deer Wintering Habitat Or The Wildlife Travel Corridor.
